name: For The Union
description:
A challenging platformer in which a lone gear ventures to destroy a factory in an act of corporate terrorism. Navigate conveyors, smokestacks, and spikes to destroy each quadrant of the factory.

 

Sound Credits:

"Machine Factory Ambience, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

"Metal Impact - Ceramic Piece in Sink" by RoganMcDougald of Freesound.org

"Flame Ignition" by hykenfreak of Freesound.org
